Articles.Content:
Might as well make my introduction flashy. I just finished my first Mun landing with my Gentoo IV rocket. It crashed immediately after taking the screeny. [edit - the game, not the rocket] :/

You can see the rocket itself here. I think it may have been slight overkill, but I ended up needing the extra delta-V to correct noob screwups (like burning the wrong direction for munar insertion)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Nice. I still haven\'t landed on the Mun!

Welcome to the Forums!
